title: Looks good.
body: It works well tho buttons quite small, not convinced that any small microwave cooks as evenly as a full size one but does the job for less money.

title: So easy to use
body: Fed up with complicated microwaves. This one is stylish but so easy to use. One touch and its done!

title: Value for Money.
body: A New Microwave for a great price of just under £100.Easy to use aswell.10/10.

title: Good Value
body: Very smart looking Microwave easy to use with preset buttons good value for money.

title: Excellent Product
body: I am very please with the Toshiba 800w 23L Microwave Oven it just looks good and working great and eases to uses

title: Really good
body: This is a great microwave and really looks nice on the worktop, would recommend

title: Great microwave works really well
body: This microwave is great easy to use and setup cooks brilliantly no problems

title: Direct time input. Sadly so rare!
body: Literally the main reason I bought this was for the ability to directly input a time. No more faffing around with knobs and presets, one button press and you can instantly enter the exact time you need. Works well, and is responsive. Great purchase.

title: Lasted 1.5 years
body: My microwave had been working with a quality slightly below other products on the market (it needed 30 seconds to 1 minute more at full power to reach the desired temperature). Today, 1.5 years after purchase, it no longer works. Sadly warranty lasts 1 year. No need to mention I WILL NEVER buy another Toshiba microwave again.

title: Works as it should.
body: Easy to operate and works well.

title: Takes longer to cook items
body: We use it for heating fast food like pastries and frozen meals very good microwave had to get used to it, we used to have a convection oven and microwave in one, otherwise would recommend it to anyone to purchase
